Name: TrainClicker Idle Evolution
About the game: TrainClicker Idle Evolution is a unique idle clicker game, first of its kind! Start your journey to experience the adventure! Click or assign engineers to move your train, unlock new engineers and use their distinctive abilities. Travel from one station to another in beautiful zones to gather gold, earn experience, and upgrade your train! Features Unique idle clicker style game! Day-night cycle! Progress through lots of levels featuring unique themes! Tran can consist of many cars and multiple train engines! Upgrade train engines from simple hand cars, steam engines to diesel engines! Unlock and assign unique engineer heroes! Assign engineers and use their skills to improve gameplay! Use skins to customize your train! Unlock and upgrade Talents to improve your train!
